item.title: Government shutdown nears record for longest ever as Senate returns
item.description: The government shutdown stretches into Day 34 on Monday as the Senate is set to reconvene. Follow live updates here.

item.title: 2025 elections in NYC, New Jersey, Virginia to test Democrats, Trump
item.description: Election Day 2025 is almost here, with consequential races in New York City, New Jersey, Virginia and a redistricting ballot measure in California.

item.title: Government shutdown feud between Democrats and Republicans drags on as SNAP recipients struggle

item.title: Is COVID-19 during pregnancy linked to autism? New study offers clues
item.description: A large study from Massachusetts found that babies whose mothers had COVID-19 while pregnant were slightly more likely to have a range of neurodevelop...

item.title: Hamas returns 3 more Israeli hostages' remains, leaving 8 still in Gaza
item.description: Among the 8 deceased Israeli hostages whose remains are yet to be returned from Gaza is soldier and U.S. citizen Itay Chen.
